ygData.subject: Tripred Base
ygData.msgSnippet: Gesper had finished reconfiguring the plants surrounding the Shadow Destiny so they would act as cannons against enemies. Belthassan: Prophets, status report.

From: "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@...>

Gesper had finished reconfiguring the plants surrounding the Shadow Destiny 
so they would act as cannons against enemies.

Belthassan:
Prophets, status report.

Gesper:
Reconfiguration is over. I am starting to work on the shield. Once 
completed, it will be able to protect us even from underground assaults. I 
expect to be done in about twenty megacycles.

Melchana:
I am having some trouble with the power diversion core. In fact, the 
generator rejects any energy input into it. I request a training break 
before this machine makes me slag it to pieces with my blades!

Belthassan:
Request accepted. (He knew the short temper of his sister, and he had known 
bots who had gotten on her nerves too long and too hard...)
Gesper, once you are done, get to the control room, I want your advice on 
the strategic emplacements near the base.

Gesper:
I read you. You think the cliffs to the west are going to pose a problem?

Belthassan:
Maybe... that's why I need you. Belthassan out. Computer, redirect any 
incoming messages to the planning room.

The computer acknowledged the demand as the Polar bear leader of the elite 
Tripredacus force went back to the strategic planning room.
